name: Panacea (Honey Ash)
description:
Ada doesn't know how she got here. She doesn't have any memory aside from her name and the knowledge of two marks on her body; one at the base of her neck, the other at the base of her spine.

Ada doesn't know what to do, but if this H is as friendly as they appear, they may be the key to solving everything.

[This game is still in very early stages and this prototype is very sparse. Please bare with me as I want to make a detailed prototype over a long period of time.]
